alert.note: Alert for Harper (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Harper County through 415 AM CDT... At 329 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kiowa, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Anthony, Harper, Attica, Waldron, Corwin and Crystal Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for south central Kansas.
